analysis: Given TimberPOS's domain (booking/payments SaaS for barbers and salons), the existing agent library covers this case well. No critical gaps.

existing_agents_coverage.company_seed: Full coverage — standard SaaS product analysis
existing_agents_coverage.founder_research: Full coverage — though limited data available for this anonymous founder
existing_agents_coverage.growth_voice: Full coverage — messaging and brand analysis applicable
existing_agents_coverage.channel_finder: Full coverage — directories, associations, and channels mapped

suggested_new_agents.name: Local Sales Playbook Agent
suggested_new_agents.rationale: Timber's best path to first customers is direct, local, in-person sales to barbershops. Our current agents focus on digital channels. A local sales agent could build: door-to-door scripts, demo frameworks, local territory planning, objection handling for walk-in sales. This is relevant for any SaaS targeting local brick-and-mortar businesses.
suggested_new_agents.reusability: high — applicable to any local business SaaS (restaurants, gyms, retail, etc.)

suggested_new_agents.name: Technical SEO Auditor Agent
suggested_new_agents.rationale: Timber's entire SEO strategy is broken because the site is a JS SPA that isn't indexable. A technical SEO agent could diagnose rendering issues, crawlability, indexation problems, and provide specific fixes. Current Growth Voice touches on messaging but doesn't deep-dive technical SEO.
suggested_new_agents.reusability: high — many SaaS products have technical SEO issues

verdict: No critical gaps — existing agents cover this domain. Two nice-to-have agents suggested for future builds. Proceed with Phase 1 using current agent library.
